name: TikTok Hashtag Generator
description: Generate hashtags for your TikTok post with AI.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Generate a mix of popular hashtags (100k-1M+ views) and niche hashtags (10k-100k views) relevant to {{tiktok_caption}} , {{keywords}} , {{target_audience}}. Focus on hashtags that encourage engagement

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Words that describe the main elements, theme, or action in your TikTok video

ui_metadata.value: Ever wanted to be an anime character, a cartoon version of yourself, or have wings?!  Now you can with AI-powered avatars!  Show me yours in the comments using #MyAIAvatar!  ➡️ Link in bio to create your own!
People interested in social media, technology, and expressing themselves creatively.
